\subsection{Enigma}
Rotorvolgorde: 420 \\
Beginstand: KSY \\
Plugboard:  AKEDCHGFYJBLWNZPSRQTUVMXIO \\
Verwisselingen in plugboard: B-K, C-E, F-H, I-Y, M-W, O-Z, Q-S \\

\subsection{Diffie-Hellman}
Gezamelijke sleutel: \\76755567381519549143666616401510211097526907381540 \\ \\
